website_summaries.verdict: Thicker than most original flavorizer bars, these heavy-gauge stainless steel bars help keep your grill hotter, for longer.
pros: Set of five thick, 16 gauge stainless steel bars
Twice as thick and more than twice the life of factory porcelain bars
Gives a hotter, more even cooking surface
Fits Weber Genesis Silver B and C, Spirit 700, Gold B and C, and Weber 900 grills
cons: May rust a bit over time, but so do many flavorizer bars

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, These Should Last A Long Time
customer_reviews.text: I wanted stainless steel flavorizer bars to replace the original stainless steel flavorizer bars that I had from Weber. These fit my grill perfectly and they are twice the thickness of my old flavorizer bars. I'm guessing that these will last longer based on the added thickness. I would buy these again, but I probably won't need to since these are of such good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer Dave

customer_reviews.title: My nine year-old Weber is like a new unit
customer_reviews.text: These are a bit heavier than the OEM bars that came with my Weber and the extra thermal mass makes for much better heat distribution and a more even cooking experience. My original bars were pretty beat up, so I'm not sure exactly home much better they are than new, stock bars, but they are certainly more substantial. Be careful handling them. You could cut yourself pretty bad with them.
customer_reviews.author: Chuchundra

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed and at less than half the cost of the Weber Flavorizer Bars. I usually buy the genuine replacement parts, but took a chance on these. They are high quality thick stainless steel. They come covered with a layer of protective plastic that you peel off. Just be careful when you do as edges can be sharp. Delighted with the purchase. These were shipped to me promptly. Great service.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: When I replaced my Weber burner tubes I noticed the ...
customer_reviews.text: When I replaced my Weber burner tubes I noticed the flavorizer bars were badly worn so I ordered new heavy duty stainless steel ones. It took longer than usual to receive them but it was all right. They fit well and worked well. They tongs that came with them are also very well made. Just be careful when you remove the white tape the bars are covered with as the edges are very sharp. Terry Goyer
customer_reviews.author: Bill Goyer

customer_reviews.title: Great SS Bars for most older 3 Burner Weber Grills
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, Solid build, Fit perfectly, Thick and heavy SS, and best of all half the price of Weber's offering. Just make sure you remove the protective coating by peeling, and you might want to wear gloves if you are worried about slicing a finger. I did 2 sets without gloves without a problem, though. Don't hesitate to get these if your existing bars are 22.5" long and your burner controls are on the side.
customer_reviews.author: McGuirk

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for my 12 year old Weber
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit! These stainless steel flavorizer bars seem to be a little bit thicker than my original ceramic coated ones. I might be wrong but it’s hard to tell since I replaced mine since they were done. Heavy corrosion. My Weber is at least 12 years old and I could have replaced the bars 2 years back but wanted to get stainless replace the ones. Now, will see if RiversEdge carries the stainless steel grates. Shipping was prompt.
customer_reviews.author: Sherlock Ossa

customer_reviews.title: like me, you have to pay for return shipping ...
customer_reviews.text: Only note is double check your ordering the correct part..Riversedge has a web site and will respond with questions if in doubt. If you get the wrong part, like me, you have to pay for return shipping but it was worth the hassle..Great thick flavor bar and should hold up better then the original. Simple concept, they are just a length of stainless steel. Only recommendation to the company, original ones have a hole to see the flame when lighting, these don't but not a big issue.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A in Atlanta

customer_reviews.title: Bought a second set for another Genesis - work well and holds up with frequent grilling
customer_reviews.text: I've had these bars for over3 years with frequent grilling and they are still in original form. That means they hold up as well or better than original equipment (Weber) flavorizer bars. They are a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Stnschndr

customer_reviews.title: Excellent replacement!
customer_reviews.text: These flavorizer bars do a better job than Weber's OEM bars at distributing heat evenly over the grill surface. This is particularly the case for those with 2009 or older three burner (front to back) Weber Spirit E and Geneisis B/C owners where heat distribution can be a challenge. I wish I had purchased these sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Heisenberg

customer_reviews.title: Great Bars, Thicker than the original but packaging is annoying.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace a set of Weber original flavorizer bars. The bars are thicker and seem to work better than the original. The only downside is they are sharp when opening and they have a protective film that you have to remove. That is the reason I gave it four stars, they work great but the preparation portion, having to remove the protective film took a lot of time and effort.
customer_reviews.author: Spin

customer_reviews.title: What Weber Should Have Supplied
customer_reviews.text: These bars are what Weber should have supplied with the original grill! Outside of the fact that they were covered with some plastic film that was somewhat of a pain to remove these bars are perfect. Fit like a glove. I highly recommend these as replacements for the short lived OEM ones.
customer_reviews.author: R. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Fits the Spirit S320 - Build quality is Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Happy with these, Recently rebuilt an old Weber Spirit S320 from the ground up, bought the porcelain bars first but found these were listed for just 1 dollar more than the porcelain! Just installed them, perfect fit, clean consistent bends and very heavy! Hope to see them last a few grilling seasons on my new restored Spirit!
customer_reviews.author: Jim D

customer_reviews.title: Bars for Weber Genesis Silver B
customer_reviews.text: These bars (7537) are a perfect fit for my Weber Genesis Silver B grill. Use the Weber site to determine which bars will fit your Weber grill. These aftermarket bars appear to be well made and they are thicker than the original. Have grilled once with them and they glowed nicely and performed well as a heat sink (which is really the bars function, the "flavorizer" name is pure marketing on Weber's part). They are VERY sharp on the edges. There are warnings all over the packaging and instructions about sharp edges. Be careful when opening, removing the protective vinyl film, and installing. These stainless steel bars should last longer than the originals (9 years for me).
customer_reviews.author: CheckJV

customer_reviews.title: It Works and Solved the Problem
customer_reviews.text: Have a 12-year-old Weber Spirit E-310 that had not been heating enough. Bought new burner tubes and flavorizer bars, but still had problem (subsequent new regulator solved problem). The flavorizer bars from RiversEdge are much better that Weber's--they're heavier gauge and higher grade stainless for less $. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie D LaBrack

customer_reviews.title: Great simple improvement for your aging Weber grill
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to replace the ones that came with my Weber Genesis Gold B grill in 2002. Thye arrived sooner than promised and in excellent condition. It was trivial to replace and remove the old ones and install the new ones - no tools required and took only about 10 minutes. As another reviewer already pointed out they really do make a difference in distributing heat more evenly than the worn, original equipment bars and look like they will be more durable. They also protect the burners below much better in preventing food drips from causing no flame zones. I highly recommend these as a simple and inexpensive way of restoring your aged grill to peak performance.
customer_reviews.author: Richard J. Feeney

customer_reviews.title: Very good product. The thickness is great
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. The thickness is great, you can see that these will last a long time. I used a dremel with a grinding stone and got rid of the sharpe edges. It did not take long. I also rounded the corners. This product was a good value for the money and arrived on the early side of the delivery window. I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brent D

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement item at half the cost
customer_reviews.text: Bought a set for a smaller Weber (21.5 inch) a month ago. Very impressed w quality and price for this inch longer item. (22.5). Also packed well for shipping. Pull adhesive protective paper between bars off slowly and it will come along. Respect that edges are sharp but filing ads to cost and once in grill - your done.
customer_reviews.author: Huckster

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: So far, I really like these stainless flavorizer bars. They seem heavy, well made. I have cooked with them twice so far and hope for excellent longevity. With my new Weber stainless steel grates and these new bars, my 10 year old Spirit grill looks brand new. Nice product !
customer_reviews.author: D4D

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: These fit my Weber perfectly. Even Weber's website is convoluted when it comes to finding parts for my exact model grill, but reading reviews and simply measuring the old bars, I got the right parts the first time. Nothing fancy, just bent stainless steel, but hopefully they will last. My originals lasted 9 years.
customer_reviews.author: dodgeballs

customer_reviews.title: I'd recommend removing the plastic before forming the pieces
customer_reviews.text: I'd buy these over any of the weber options in a heartbeat again. To the maker of this product, I'd recommend removing the plastic before forming the pieces, we don't need them to be scuff free, but we do need our food to be plastic free.
customer_reviews.author: Jmutiger

customer_reviews.title: As good or better than original
customer_reviews.text: These are aftermarket and appear to be a little thicker than the originals but mine are deteriorated so it is a little hard to tell. They feel heavier. The fit is perfect. The only difference is the top is not as rounded as the Weber ones were. My old ones lasted about 12-13 years. If these last as long, I will be happy. While I was at it, I replaced the burners, igniter and grates. For about $140 total I essentially have a new grill. Oh, the plastic protector peals right off the product in a few seconds. Do not stress over it unless your time is that valuable.
customer_reviews.author: Recorder

customer_reviews.title: Better than original equipment!
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly in my restored Spirit Special Edition Weber gas grill! Found my grill curbside on the same evening walk as I found a Genesis Silver B - cannibalized the Genesis for its stainless steel grill plates then ordered these new Flavorizer Bars. So for (two grillings) it's all working perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: William C. Langham

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: These are a perfect fit for my Weber Genesis Silver B grill. Nice and heavy, I expect I'll get a long life out of this product, and the cost is a fraction of the OEM flavorizer bars. I'd like to add that since replacing my flavorizer bars with this product that I've gone from being just an average backyard griller to a world-class grillmaster that can out-grill anyone in town. But I won't lie. These did, however, reduce flare ups compared to the old rusty ones that they replaced, so my grilling has improved.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy: the flavorizer bars fit, and they are heavy duty.
customer_reviews.text: Great replacements for an older set of stainless 'flavorizer' bars that were beginning to deteriorate. These are a simple product, but they seem to be excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Wingard

customer_reviews.title: The Stainless Flavorizer Bars were a PERFECT fit!
customer_reviews.text: The Stainless Flavorizer Bars were a PERFECT fit on my Weber Spirit SP-310 grill. I am SO glad I took the chance on these. If I had gotten the Porcelain-Enameled Flavorizer Bars (at roughly the same price from Weber) I'm sure I would've been replacing them in a few years. These were almost half the cost of the stainless flavorizer bars from the Weber website. VERY happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas D.

customer_reviews.title: A value product that will last the long haul
customer_reviews.text: This is the item that Weber should sell, except that they would be far more expensive than they are with the Weber name on them! I have personally inspected the competing Weber product and these are heavier gauge (as advertised) and arrive in pristine condition with excellent packaging. These were part of a makeover for my ~2003 Genesis Silver, giving it a professional look and with high functionality, when it comes time to clean them. A great value and highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: theholmboy

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement and a lower cost vs the Weber bars
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement and a lower cost vs the Weber bars. Perfect drop-in fit. Brats and burgers no longer turning into a charred mess.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopperCVG

customer_reviews.title: Better than original
customer_reviews.text: I bought these flavorizer bars as replacements for my 20+ year old Weber Silver B. The bars fit perfectly. I was impressed by the thickness of the steel. They should last a long time. Word of warning - be careful of the sharp edges.
customer_reviews.author: Dulcimer Dave

customer_reviews.title: Superb Product
customer_reviews.text: Received these today and I am thourghly satisfied with them. They are very substantial and they fit my Weber Spirit grill perfectly. Best of all they are half the cost of Weber stainless steel flavorizer bars. Happy, Happy, Happy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Burnsie

customer_reviews.title: Nice heavy duty stainless bars for Weber Genesis grills
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy duty stainless bars for Weber Genesis grills. Fit perfectly measure 1st. 22.5 inches Come coated with plastic film. Use a hairdryer to slightly warm film and it comes right off.
customer_reviews.author: Big Bert

customer_reviews.title: Saw them, liked them, ordered them, installed them, love them.
customer_reviews.text: As others have stated, the edges are pretty damn sharp, so be careful. Nice heavy gauge stainless steel, I believe they're thicker than the originals (which served me well, by the way, but they were just getting too funky and warped lately after several years.) Once I placed the new ones in there, I realized I really needed to clean the interior of the grill, so thanks, Amazon, that's what I ended up doing at 10:30 last night. They looked so nice and shiny in there, I'm gonna feel guilty cooking anything with juices at first. Got them in just a few days. I would definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Rick D

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I switched to stainless
customer_reviews.text: These are a big improvement over the stock flavorizers although they were 9 years old....I've had them for a couple of months and have cooked chicken,steaks,salmon, and kabobs. There is no flare up except a very little on the chicken. The most surprising thing is that the food tastes noticeably better. I'm giving it four stars only because of the relatively short time we've been using them and am not sure about their durability .
customer_reviews.author: Jerry L.

customer_reviews.title: Heavier than original part
customer_reviews.text: Replaced for 2nd time on a 17 year old Weber Genesis. Like the heavier gauge stainless steel. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: D. Abernethy

customer_reviews.title: These have given me my grill back! Less expensive ...
customer_reviews.text: These have given me my grill back! Less expensive than weber brand and very high quality. As long as you are measuring the bars you're replacing, you can't go wrong with these.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Good quality I would recommend these Flavorizer bars
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to finally replace the original bars on my Weber Genesis grille. Be very careful when removing the protective plastic covering, the edges are very sharp. Good quality I would recommend these Flavorizer bars...
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Fit to perfection and is very happy with the quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for replacement for Weber Spirit. My father-n-law had bought two sets that wouldn't fit and he was running around returning. I told him I would order him a set. He loves them! Totally met and exceeded all of his expectation. Fit to perfection and is very happy with the quality!
customer_reviews.author: two

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Brought a 15 year old Weber grill back to life!! Great product that fits perfectly and cooks like a new grill without the cost!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal and Fit Well
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement for my original flavor bars that rusted out. The reason for only 4 stars is that the Weber SS bars are mad from a better grade of stainless steel. The price is half of the Weber price so these are a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: George_L

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Original
customer_reviews.text: Needed to replace original Weber product. These are very high quality, probably better than original. As other have noted, be careful as they are very sharp to handle and can cut you quickly if not careful.
customer_reviews.author: MPD

customer_reviews.title: Good quality replacement parts for grill
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to find these on Amazon. We have a 10 year old grill that was in great shape however these bars had worn out over the years of use. These were easy to install and were a perfect fit. They seem slightly thicker than the original bars and I am hopeful that I will get at least another 10 years out of our grill.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement and high quality
customer_reviews.text: High quality flavorizer bars! Fit my Weber Genesis Gold gas grill perfectly. Seem to be better quality than the OEM bars. Just be aware that they're heavy and the edges are sharp!
customer_reviews.author: Dom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for Weber Silver B
customer_reviews.text: Great product, perfect fit! Thicker than the original ones. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Nate K

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement for original ones.
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly. Original ones had rusted out. As others have said the edges are sharp but not a big deal since you only really handle them when you do a thorough cleaning. The steel is not flimsy, I think these will hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: chocolatecraver

customer_reviews.title: Works great on my Spirit S320 grill
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my Spirit S320 grill, it feels like a new grill now. 9/2/19 - It's been over 2 years and the bars are still in excellent condition! I use the grill about once a week on average. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Chris11

customer_reviews.title: Love’em
customer_reviews.text: Nothing bad to say. Half the price of the Weber and work just as well
customer_reviews.author: ckeilts

customer_reviews.title: Updated-5 yrs later and they’re still perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These flavorizer bars are high quality. They fit perfectly. They are a solid investment for your grill. Make sure you order your exact size as they are not interchangeable. As others have stated the edges are sharp so take care once you have removed their wrapping. I am totally satisfied with this vendor and this product. I would order from them again.
customer_reviews.author: lfd

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Gauge Stainless Steel !
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy gauge (more than other sellers) Stainless steel. Far superior to the Weber Porcelain flavorizer bars which rusted on me. These should last a long time and handle heavy cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Tesla

customer_reviews.title: A perfect fit and beautifully made
customer_reviews.text: A perfect fit and beautifully made. I've only had them in for a few weeks now but they look great and I'm hopeful that the stainless steel will be less subject to the heat induced oxidation than the OEM bars were. I guess time will tell! At the very least the extra thickness should help though.
customer_reviews.author: T. Judkins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit my weber grill perfectly. Hopefully they don't rust out as quick as the old ones.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Better than OEM Weber bars
customer_reviews.text: Fit my Genysis just fine and protective plastic wrap was easy to remove. If you have a problem then just use a knife to start peeling off the plastic. Once started, it peels off in a single piece. Much sturdier than OEM and I expect it to last much longer than the OEM pieces.
customer_reviews.author: D. Murakami

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product - Would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely heavy duty. I've been using Weber grills since 2001. I never had to replace the flavorizer bars until this past summer. These bars are heavy duty (16 gauge) and are cheaper than the Weber branded version. I would most definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: DuderMaguder

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My five year old bars were getting pretty thin, and these had good reviews. Ordered them, they came in three days, and I had them installed in five minutes. They fit perfectly. Have used the grill about 20 times since, and have no complaints. These should last at least another five years.
customer_reviews.author: foradrive

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for our Weber. Thank you for making them available on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Cathie Brown

customer_reviews.title: Keep that Weber grill going.
customer_reviews.text: Holding up great, fantastic quality. Keep the old weber, the new ones are not made as well.
customer_reviews.author: giff

customer_reviews.title: Old porcelain covered bars needed some help and I believe ...
customer_reviews.text: Old porcelain covered bars needed some help and I believe that these stainless steel replacement are just the ticket. They were an exact fit too.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Stamper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my burnt through and rusted out bars with these. These are really heavy duty and fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality - Look like they will last a LONG time
customer_reviews.text: These bars are nice heavy gauge metal and fit my Silver Genesis B grill perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: G. Gross

customer_reviews.title: Very good replacement
customer_reviews.text: Good solid replacement. Hopefully won't rust away like the originals. We have used for the summer. Effectively restored our grill and made it useable.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Better than new
customer_reviews.text: I just rebuilt the 2002 model Genesis Gold new burners, SS grates, ignitor, wheels repainted the fire box and shelf. I spotted these and took a chance on a non Weber part. I figured it's just bent SS so why not. Well the difference in thickness is really nice! The old 18 Ga originals were flimsy compared to these. I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Dogdad

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, nice thick stainless, will last the lifetime of the grill.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Have held up fine for a couple weeks
customer_reviews.text: Have held up fine for a couple weeks. They are a heavier gauge than the stock ceramic coated steel they are replacing. Will update the review in a year or so.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Nice, Heavy duty!
customer_reviews.text: After going through 2 sets of the original weber flavorizer bars I was ready for something that should last longer. I believe I've found it. They fit perfect and were nice and heavy since they are made of 16 gauge SS. The edges are sharp but since I don't intend to juggle these I shouldn't have a problem. I'm confident I will get longer use than the original Weber ones that rust and corrode too fast (these shouldn't).
customer_reviews.author: AzBBQer

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, heavier than original Weber bars
customer_reviews.text: Good fit, heavier than original Weber bars, expect it to be years from now before I can say they lasted much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Rriles

customer_reviews.title: Heavy gauge
customer_reviews.text: This are a nice heavy gauge metal at about 1/2 the price of what Weber is charging and I can't imagine that theirs are that much better. Fit was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: If your factory flavorizer bars are rusted out like mine were
customer_reviews.text: I received the flavorizer bars very quickly. They fit in my Weber perfectly. Installation took less than 5 minutes. Now my grill heats evenly across the entire grilling surface. If your factory flavorizer bars are rusted out like mine were, I recommend this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Blaine M. Heisner

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy duty grates
customer_reviews.text: These are very heavy duty and look great. I would think we should get many years use out of them before they rust out.
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: A valuable investment- works great
customer_reviews.text: 2 plus years and going strong. Even bought some for my dads BBQ.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Everyday

customer_reviews.title: Good fit. And thicker (which is better)!
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly. They're thicker than the original ones that came with the grill.
customer_reviews.author: Art Vandelay

customer_reviews.title: Super heavy duty!
customer_reviews.text: Blows away the factory Weber bars. Super thick and perfectly packaged. There are no better bars out there than these!
customer_reviews.author: Prime Customer

customer_reviews.title: A PERFECT TRANSACTION.
customer_reviews.text: A perfect transaction, the bars fit my Weber Genesis Silver B exactly, 22 1/2 inches. I wore work gloves and had no trouble separating the bars or peeling off the paper. They toured five states with UPS and arrived with no damage. They were very well packed. I WOULD RECOMMEND THIS SELLER WITHOUT RESERVATION.
customer_reviews.author: Big T

customer_reviews.title: Flavorizer Bars Work Well
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy gauge stainless that fit into my Weber Genesis Silver gas grill just right. They seem better than the original enameled bars. Of course I won't know about their longevity for a couple of years. Just be careful installing them since they have sharp edges that they warn you of.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Purchased on Amazon 2010 they are still working as expected ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased on Amazon 2010 they are still working as expected. Superficial surface rust from years of use and drippings. I keep my Weber covered with a grill cover. Would buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: dr banks

customer_reviews.title: excellent upgrade
customer_reviews.text: have had these in for about 8 months now. they are holding up great and serving their purpose. I have only the stock non-stainless ones to compare, but these are better and may have slightly better heat distribution as I've noticed prior hot spots are not as pronounced.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Shoemaker

customer_reviews.title: Great aftermarket Flavorizer bars
customer_reviews.text: Great aftermarket Flavorizer bars. Fit my Weber Genesis Silver perfectly, I have Weber stainless flavorizer bars on another grill. The Riveredge bars are thicker. Price was right too.
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the flavorizor bars for my Weber Spirit 310.
customer_reviews.author: Jon B

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement for stock Weber bars
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly. I have used them only a few times so far. They do take a few minutes more to heat up than the stock bars, probably due to the heavier gauge. Not enough use to judge durability yet but very satisfied so far.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: SS flavorizer bars, Webber gas grill
customer_reviews.text: My original weber gas grill flavorizer bars were warping and rusting, these replacement bars are great look just as weber brand but cheaper price, I am glad I ordered them now my meats and vegies that I grill come out nice and evenly cooked of course tase good too. I recommend these replacement bars.
customer_reviews.author: Imad Batti

customer_reviews.title: Excellent upgrade/replacement for the originals
customer_reviews.text: Excellent upgrade/replacement for the originals. Weber Genesis Silver C (2001), Northeast US, Always covered, always outside, used year-round- STILL grills like new! :-D
customer_reviews.author: T. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Real nice, heavy Gage material. Be careful, edges are sharp.
customer_reviews.author: bad mofo

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be better quality than the comparable Weber bars
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be better quality than the comparable Weber bars. Fit nice and are working great. Time will tell how will they hold up. Beware of the sharp edges.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Stainless Flavorizer Bars 7537
customer_reviews.text: I found this product to be an excellent replacement for my previous enamel version, with regards to durability, it is to soon to tell but I believe that they should outlast my original version. Product delivery was on time and no surprises.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Trifiro

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper and better than Weber brand stuff.
customer_reviews.text: If your flavorizers are worn through like ours were, you will like these. Wear gloves as the edges are very sharp. Heavy stainless should last a while. Seems to maintain the heat evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa J

customer_reviews.title: Thick stainless and a perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty stainless steel to replace my porcelain coated originals on my Weber Genesis Silver gas grill. Fit perfectly and look great. These should last a while
customer_reviews.author: kazankota

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great bars, work very well, and much cheaper than the "name brand" versions. The bars were well protected out of the box, requiring a plastic protective coating (basically saran wrap) to be removed before use. Definitely recommend these to anyone looking for a solid flavorizer bar replacement for their Weber grill.
customer_reviews.author: Mark W Kroncke

customer_reviews.title: I want to receive the exact item I ordered and payed for!
customer_reviews.text: The bars fit perfectly on my gas grill but I didn’t receive exactly what I ordered. I ordered the bars that the thickness is16 ga but I got bars that are 17 ga instead
customer_reviews.author: Eloy González

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I replaced the flavorizor bars, igniter, and grates on my 12-year old Weber Genesis Silver B. My grill cooks better now that it did then - And I though it was good then! Between the enamel-coated cast iron grates and these heavier flavorizor bars, my grill burns hotter than it did before, which really makes it sear much better than before. I highly recommend these flavorizor bars.
customer_reviews.author: Foodie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for my 2008 Weber Spirit E310, really heavy duty compared to the ones they replaced.
customer_reviews.author: skjos

customer_reviews.title: These are an excellent replacement for my Spirit E-310
customer_reviews.text: These are an excellent replacement for my Spirit E-310. Don't notice much difference cooking but they're clearly going to last a long time - heavy, thick stainless that isn't going to wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Owens

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I am really impressed so far with my flavorizer bars. They seem to be really well made. They are much thicker & heavier than the Weber brand were. For half the price of the name brand how can you go wrong? They really seem to hold heat much better. We grill a lot around this house & have had to buy 2 sets of the Weber brand bars in the past 5 years & in pretty short order they rust, begin to crumble, & eventually just fall apart. I expect a much better performance from these just in differences I notice from the brand new product.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Smith

customer_reviews.title: nice bars
customer_reviews.text: The original ceramic bars on my Weber were getting rusty and nasty. So I replaced them with these. So far they are performing well. No issues noted. And, hopefully, since they are stainless I won't have to worry about them rusting out in a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Onepoorguy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and fit for Weber Spirit S320
customer_reviews.text: Better than original equipment. Perfect fit for my Weber Spirit S320 purchased at the Home Depot 9 years ago. Heavy gauge stainless steel and perfect fir, can't ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: GEORGE C. BRONSTEIN

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Gave my Weber a more even grilling surface. Glad I bought the higher gauge version.
customer_reviews.author: PD2K

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: These bars seem sturdier than the original Weber replacements. The first time I replaced these bars, I used the original equipment for twice the price and they did not seem as sturdy as these aftermarket flavor bars. I expect these to outlast the grill.
customer_reviews.author: paulyrusso

customer_reviews.title: Buy these and you won't be disapointed.
customer_reviews.text: The flavorizer bars were well made, well packed and fit perfectly. They should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Very good replacement buy
customer_reviews.text: Heavier than original part, they were priced right, fit right into place and work fine. On a low tech item like this what more can you ask for? .
customer_reviews.author: Ramman

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely thicker than the Weber bars. Super great deal. Look no further. Don't waste $$ on the Weber bars!
customer_reviews.author: Rickey H Carrera

customer_reviews.title: High quality, overpriced shipping.
customer_reviews.text: The other reviews are spot on in terms of just how superior these are over the OEM Weber flavorizer bars. This would get 5 stars except for the $13 shipping that was supposed to be here in 2 days but took 4.
customer_reviews.author: osalim28

customer_reviews.title: really like these aftermarket bars
customer_reviews.text: really like these aftermarket bars. Like everyone else said, they are heavy duty and 1/2 the price of Weber parts. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dave, Boston

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for Weber Genesis Gold
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit to replace on my Weber Genesis Gold Stainless BBQ. I can BBQ chicken again as it covers the burners correctly. Makes a 12 year old BBQ like new.
customer_reviews.author: NWmind

customer_reviews.title: Big thick meaty stainless for less than the ever more precious factory parts.
customer_reviews.text: Big thick meaty stainless for less than the ever more precious factory parts.
customer_reviews.author: Kev'n

product_meta.title: RiversEdge Products Stainless Flavorizer Bars, Set of 5, 16 Gauge, 22.5", 7537, 65903
product_meta.description: This set of 5 stainless flavorizer bars from RiversEdge Products is an excellent replacement for your worn out porcelain bars. Made from 430 grade, 16 Ga. stainless steel, these bars are twice as thick and will give you many years of reliable service. Model 7537 fits the Genesis Silver B & C, Spirit 700, Gold B & C and the Weber 900. PLEASE NOTE: Weber makes many similar-sounding models. Double-check the length of your existing bars before ordering to save yourself money, time and frustration. Manufactured in Broseley, Missouri. 5 year warranty against stainless pitting or failure. RiversEdge has yet to have a warranty claim on any Flavorizer bar in all the years of manufacturing.
feature_bullets: Made in USA! Solid stainless steel to replace worn, thin ceramic coated carbon steel
Heavy Duty 430 grade 16 gauge stainless steel. Will last many,many years!
No more sharp edges, ready to use out of the box!
**Double check the length on your existing bars before ordering!**
Each bar measures 22.5" long by 2.375" wide by 2" tall, set of 5.
